person_attribute_type.name: Race
person_attribute_type.description: Group of persons related by common descent or heredity

person_attribute_type.name: Birthplace
person_attribute_type.description: Location of persons birth

person_attribute_type.name: Citizenship
person_attribute_type.description: Country of which this person is a member

person_attribute_type.name: Mother's Name
person_attribute_type.description: First or last name of this person's mother

person_attribute_type.name: Civil Status
person_attribute_type.description: Marriage status of this person

person_attribute_type.name: Health District
person_attribute_type.description: District/region in which this patient' home health center resides

person_attribute_type.name: Health Center
person_attribute_type.description: Specific Location of this person's home health center.

person_attribute_type.name: MDR-TB Patient Contact ID Number
person_attribute_type.description: Used by the mdrtb module to give non-patient contacts an ID number.

person_attribute_type.name: Home Village
person_attribute_type.description: The person's home village or place of origin

person_attribute_type.name: Mother's Maiden Name
person_attribute_type.description: The maiden name of the person's mother.

person_attribute_type.name: Cell Phone Number
person_attribute_type.description: Person primary cell phone number

person_attribute_type.name: Occupation
person_attribute_type.description: This is the current patient occupation

person_attribute_type.name: Home Phone Number
person_attribute_type.description: Person home phone number, usually fixed line phone number

person_attribute_type.name: Office Phone Number
person_attribute_type.description: Person office phone number. Usually fixed line phone number

person_attribute_type.name: Place Of Birth
person_attribute_type.description: Description for birth place for a client in Maternity

person_attribute_type.name: Ancestral Traditional Authority
person_attribute_type.description: T/A

person_attribute_type.name: Current Place Of Residence
person_attribute_type.description: Place of stay

person_attribute_type.name: Landmark Or Plot Number
person_attribute_type.description: Landmark or plot number

person_attribute_type.name: Agrees to phone text for TB therapy
person_attribute_type.description: This question asked at registration to ascertain if person agrees to be sent phone text messages for TB therapy

person_attribute_type.name: Agrees to be visited at home for TB therapy
person_attribute_type.description: This asked at registration to ascertain if person agrees to home visit by HCW for TB therapy

person_attribute_type.name: ART status at registration
person_attribute_type.description: ART status of this person at registration

person_attribute_type.name: NEXT OF KIN
person_attribute_type.description: A patient's next of kin

person_attribute_type.name: NEXT OF KIN CONTACT NUMBER
person_attribute_type.description: A patient's next of kin contact number

person_attribute_type.name: Source of referral
person_attribute_type.description: The source of referral for this person. Could be self. health facility etc

person_attribute_type.name: Number of TB contacts
person_attribute_type.description: Number of people TB patient is in contact with within a household

person_attribute_type.name: EDUCATION LEVEL
person_attribute_type.description: Maternity required this field

person_attribute_type.name: Religion
person_attribute_type.description: Maternity required this field

person_attribute_type.name: Test Patient
person_attribute_type.description: Flag to describe if the patient was created for demonstration or testing purposes

person_attribute_type.name: Unknown patient
person_attribute_type.description: Used to flag patients that cannot be identified during the check-in process
